questions.question: A GIS Technician wants to run a workspace every morning that processes files. When this workspace completes, a second workspace summarizes the work completed, then sends an email. Which of the following scheduling workflows would be best?
options: Build 2 scheduled jobs from the Schedules interface.
Build 1 scheduled job from the Schedules interface.

questions.question: You have a workspace that needs to run every 5 minutes. Which of the following Schedule Types is the most simple solution?

You created a Scheduled task that delivers reports to your staff every morning. 3 weeks later, some staffers let you know they didnâ€™t get their reports that day. What is the best first troubleshooting step?
options: Manually run the job from Run Workspace page.
Manually run the workspace from FME Workbench.
